title: Book readers in the U.S. 2019 , by age group
summary: This statistic presents the Share of people in the U.S. who have read at least one Book in the past 12 months as of 2018 , broken down by age .
During a survey , 81 % of respondents aged 18 to 29 stated they had read at least one Book in the previous 12 months .
The popularity of this medium is reflected in the increased Book sales revenue .
